channel.title: Making and working with shops?
channel.description:
ya... well i've been trying to make shops and st00f for like ... V.I.P. members and regular members... but whenever i make one... and then get the NPC ready and autospawn it... and then trade it... it will disconnect me? EVERY TIME! ... if i talk to it... nothing happens... if i trade it it disconnects me :(...
HELP ME WITH MAKING SHOPS
just tell me how to make shops? or give me the adress to a TUT on making shops

UR MODELS ARE FUCKED[/quote]

learn what your talking about jackass.

ONTOPIC: You have added more then 40 items per shop…In your shop.cfg just delete a few. Happens to me alot.
